subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: A cold sense of dread used to descend on the afternoon before the opening day at the United States Open. But this year, there is a different, almost hopeful vibe at Torrey Pines.
snippet: A cold sense of dread used to descend on the afternoon before the opening day at the United States Open. But this year, there is a different, almost hopeful vibe at Torrey Pines.
